content: k21 48 sts foot k around k1 ssk k22 k2tog k21 46 sts k around continuing with mc knit until you have k1 ssk k20 k2tog k21 44 sts completed 24 rounds in mc - from the beginning of the gusset k around k1 ssk k18 k2tog k21 42 sts k around toe k1 ssk k16 k2tog k21 40 sts switch to cc and knit 1 round 40 sts *k1 ssk k14 k2tog k1 repeat from * to end 36 sts knit around *k1 ssk k12 k2tog k1 repeat from * to end 32 sts knit around *k1 ssk k10 k2tog k1 repeat from * to end 28 sts knit around *k1 ssk k8 k2tog k1 repeat from * to end 24 sts knit around *k1 ssk k6 k2tog k1 repeat from * to end 20 sts graft toe shut using the kitchener stitch picking up stitches along the gusset when doing color weave in loose ends work note that you cut the cc yarn white at the end of the heel turn and go back to the mc red to begin picking using a 6-8 inch length of yarn create a loop for up sts for the gusset hanging your stocking ©2013 major knitter www majorknitter com all rights reserved jennifer l jackson 2
